title: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fushigi na Fushigi na Daibouken

synonyms: Pocket Monsters: Pikachu's Really Mysterious Adventure
alternative_titles.ja: ピカチュウのふしぎなふしぎな大冒険

synopsis:
While being let out to play by their trainers, Pikachu and Piplup wind up separated from their Pokémon friends and wind up travelling with a Skitty into a strange dimension, unknowingly followed by Croagunk, Team Rocket's Pokémon and a Marill that's desperate to have someone hear her sing... 

(Source: Bulbapedia)
